languages.text: "Исключено". {n}В голосе Стракса звучит сталь.{/n} "Между Адептус Арбитес и Администратумом в Просторе есть четкое разделение полномочий, засвидетельственное династией фон Валанциус и закрепленное в Лекс Даргонус. Транспортировка десятины на Летус или с него и обеспечение ее сохранности — юрисдикция Адептус Арбитес. Лишь мы и глава династии имеем право ступать на Летус или знать его координаты. Так гласит закон".

"Out of the question." {n}There is steely ringing in Strachs's voice.{/n} "In the Koronus Expanse, there exists a strict separation of authority between the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum, as certified by the von Valancius dynasty and formalised in the Lex Dargonus. Transporting the tithe to and from Leethus and maintaining its security is the duty of the Adeptus Arbites. Aside from the head of the dynasty, only we have the right to set foot on Leethus or to know its coordinates. Such is the word of the law."
languages.original_text: "Исключено". {n}В голосе Стракса звучит сталь.{/n} "Между Адептус Арбитес и Администратумом в Просторе есть четкое разделение полномочий, засвидетельственное династией фон Валанциус и закрепленное в Лекс Даргонус. Транспортировка десятины на Летус или с него и обеспечение ее сохранности — юрисдикция Адептус Арбитес. Лишь мы и глава династии имеем право ступать на Летус или знать его координаты. Так гласит закон".

traits.locale_text: "Out of the question." {n}There is steel ringing in Strachs's voice.{/n} "In the Koronus Expanse, there exists a strict separation of authority between the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum as certified by the von Valancius dynasty and formalised in the Lex Dargonus. Transporting the tithe to and from Leethus and maintaining its security is the duty of the Adeptus Arbites. Only we and the head of the dynasty have the right to set foot on Leethus or know its coordinates. Such is the word of law."

Transporting the tithe to and from Leethus and maintaining its security is the duty of the Adeptus Arbites. Aside from the head of the dynasty, only we have the right to set foot on Leethus or to know its coordinates. Such is the word of the law."

"Out of the question." {n}There is steely ringing in Strachs's voice.{/n} "In the Koronus Expanse, there exists a strict separation of authority between the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum, as certified by the von Valancius dynasty and formalised in the Lex Dargonus. Transporting the tithe to and from Leethus and maintaining its security is the duty of the Adeptus Arbites. Aside from the head of the dynasty, only we have the right to set foot on Leethus or to know its coordinates. Such is the word of the law."

languages.text: « Il n'en est pas question, {n}déclare Strachs d'une voix aux accents métalliques.{/n} Dans les Étendues de Koronus, il existe une séparation stricte entre les autorités de l'Adeptus Arbites et de l'Administratum, certifiée par la dynastie von Valancius et formalisée dans la Lex Dargonus. Le transport de la dîme vers et hors de Leethus, ainsi que sa protection, relèvent de la responsabilité de l'Adeptus Arbites. Avec {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie, nous sommes les seuls à pouvoir accéder à Leethus, ainsi qu'à connaître ses coordonnées. Telle est la loi. »
languages.original_text: "Out of the question." {n}There is steely ringing in Strachs's voice.{/n} "In the Koronus Expanse, there exists a strict separation of authority between the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum, as certified by the von Valancius dynasty and formalised in the Lex Dargonus. Transporting the tithe to and from Leethus and maintaining its security is the duty of the Adeptus Arbites. Aside from the head of the dynasty, only we have the right to set foot on Leethus or to know its coordinates. Such is the word of the law."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'en est pas question, {n}déclare Strachs d'une voix aux accents métalliques.{/n} Dans les Étendues de Koronus, il existe une séparation stricte entre les autorités de l'Adeptus Arbites et de l'Administratum, certifiée par la dynastie von Valancius et formalisée dans la Lex Dargonus. Le transport de la dîme vers et hors de Leethus, ainsi que sa protection, relèvent de la responsabilité de l'Adeptus Arbites. Avec {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie, nous sommes les seuls à pouvoir accéder à Leethus, ainsi qu'à connaître ses coordonnées. Telle est la loi. »

languages.text: «Imposible». {n}La voz de Strachs es firme como el acero.{/n} «En la Extensión de Koronus hay una estricta separación de poderes entre el Adeptus Arbites y el Administratum, que quedó certificada por la dinastía von Valancius y formalizada en la Lex Dargonus. El transporte del diezmo a y desde Leethus y su protección son labor del Adeptus Arbites. Aparte de{mf|l| la} cabeza de la dinastía, solo nosotros tenemos derecho a poner pie en Leethus y conocer sus coordenadas. Es lo que dicta la ley».
languages.original_text: "Out of the question." {n}There is steely ringing in Strachs's voice.{/n} "In the Koronus Expanse, there exists a strict separation of authority between the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum, as certified by the von Valancius dynasty and formalised in the Lex Dargonus. Transporting the tithe to and from Leethus and maintaining its security is the duty of the Adeptus Arbites. Aside from the head of the dynasty, only we have the right to set foot on Leethus or to know its coordinates. Such is the word of the law."

traits.locale_text: «Imposible». {n}La voz de Strachs es firme como el acero.{/n} «En la Extensión de Koronus hay una estricta separación de poderes entre el Adeptus Arbites y el Administratum, que quedó certificada por la dinastía von Valancius y formalizada en la Lex Dargonus. El transporte del diezmo a y desde Leethus y su protección son labor del Adeptus Arbites. Aparte de{mf|l| la} cabeza de la dinastía, solo nosotros tenemos derecho a poner pie en Leethus y conocer sus coordenadas. Es lo que dicta la ley».

languages.text: “绝无可能。”{n}斯塔克斯斩钉截铁地回答道。{/n}“在科罗努斯扩区，帝国法务部与内政部之间存在着严格的权能分离。这样的制度得到了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的认可，也正式记录在达戈努斯法典之中。将什一税运送至利瑟斯，维护什一税的安全，这是法务部的职责。除了王朝领袖之外，只有我们有权得知利瑟斯的坐标，前往该行星。律法就是这么规定的。”
languages.original_text: "Out of the question." {n}There is steely ringing in Strachs's voice.{/n} "In the Koronus Expanse, there exists a strict separation of authority between the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum, as certified by the von Valancius dynasty and formalised in the Lex Dargonus. Transporting the tithe to and from Leethus and maintaining its security is the duty of the Adeptus Arbites. Aside from the head of the dynasty, only we have the right to set foot on Leethus or to know its coordinates. Such is the word of the law."

traits.locale_text: “绝无可能。”{n}斯塔克斯斩钉截铁地回答道。{/n}“在科罗努斯扩区，帝国法务部与内政部之间存在着严格的权能分离。这样的制度得到了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的认可，也正式记录在达戈努斯法典之中。将什一税运送至利瑟斯，维护什一税的安全，这是法务部的职责。除了王朝领袖之外，只有我们有权得知利瑟斯的坐标，前往该行星。律法就是这么规定的。”

languages.text: "Kommt nicht in Frage." {n}Strachs Stimme ist hart wie Stahl.{/n} "In der Koronus-Ausdehnung gilt eine strikte Trennung der Autorität des Adeptus Arbites und des Administratums, die durch die Dynastie derer von Valancius zertifiziert und im Lex Dargonus verankert wurde. Der sichere Transport des Zehnts von und nach Leethus ist Aufgabe des Adeptus Arbites. Neben dem Oberhaupt der Dynastie haben wir allein das Recht, Leethus zu betreten oder seine Koordinaten zu kennen. So verlangt es das Gesetz."
languages.original_text: "Out of the question." {n}There is steely ringing in Strachs's voice.{/n} "In the Koronus Expanse, there exists a strict separation of authority between the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum, as certified by the von Valancius dynasty and formalised in the Lex Dargonus. Transporting the tithe to and from Leethus and maintaining its security is the duty of the Adeptus Arbites. Aside from the head of the dynasty, only we have the right to set foot on Leethus or to know its coordinates. Such is the word of the law."

traits.locale_text: "Kommt nicht in Frage." {n}Strachs Stimme ist hart wie Stahl.{/n} "In der Koronus-Ausdehnung gilt eine strikte Trennung der Autorität des Adeptus Arbites und des Administratums, die durch die Dynastie derer von Valancius zertifiziert und im Lex Dargonus verankert wurde. Der sichere Transport des Zehnts von und nach Leethus ist Aufgabe des Adeptus Arbites. Neben dem Oberhaupt der Dynastie haben wir allein das Recht, Leethus zu betreten oder seine Koordinaten zu kennen. So verlangt es das Gesetz."

languages.text: 「論外です」{n}ストラッチスの声には鋼のような響きがあった。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスにおいては、高等裁定局と行政局の権限は厳密に分離されています。この体制はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝よって認証され、レックス・ダルゴナスにより正式に定められています。リーサスへの租税の輸送およびその保全は、高等裁定局の責務です。リーザスに立ち入ること、あるいはその座標を知ることが許されているのは、王朝の当主と私たちだけです。そのように法に定められています」
languages.original_text: "Out of the question." {n}There is steely ringing in Strachs's voice.{/n} "In the Koronus Expanse, there exists a strict separation of authority between the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum, as certified by the von Valancius dynasty and formalised in the Lex Dargonus. Transporting the tithe to and from Leethus and maintaining its security is the duty of the Adeptus Arbites. Aside from the head of the dynasty, only we have the right to set foot on Leethus or to know its coordinates. Such is the word of the law."

traits.locale_text: 「論外です」{n}ストラッチスの声には鋼のような響きがあった。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスにおいては、高等裁定局と行政局の権限は厳密に分離されています。この体制はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝よって認証され、レックス・ダルゴナスにより正式に定められています。リーサスへの租税の輸送およびその保全は、高等裁定局の責務です。リーザスに立ち入ること、あるいはその座標を知ることが許されているのは、王朝の当主と私たちだけです。そのように法に定められています」

languages.text: "Söz konusu bile olamaz." {n}Strachs'ın sesi, çelik gibi sert çıkıyor.{/n} "Koronus Enginliği'nde, Adeptus Arbites ile Administratum arasında olup von Valancius hanedanlığınca onaylanmış ve Lex Dragonus ile resmiyete kavuşturulmuş katı bir yetki ayrımı vardır. Aşarın Leethus'a ve Leethus'tan taşınması ile güvenliğinin sağlanması, Adeptus Arbites'in vazifesidir. Hanedanlığın başı dışında yalnızca bizim Leethus'a ayak basmaya ve koordinatlarını bilmeye hakkımız vardır. Yasanın hükmü budur."
languages.original_text: "Out of the question." {n}There is steely ringing in Strachs's voice.{/n} "In the Koronus Expanse, there exists a strict separation of authority between the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum, as certified by the von Valancius dynasty and formalised in the Lex Dargonus. Transporting the tithe to and from Leethus and maintaining its security is the duty of the Adeptus Arbites. Aside from the head of the dynasty, only we have the right to set foot on Leethus or to know its coordinates. Such is the word of the law."

traits.locale_text: "Söz konusu bile olamaz." {n}Strachs'ın sesi, çelik gibi sert çıkıyor.{/n} "Koronus Enginliği'nde, Adeptus Arbites ile Administratum arasında olup von Valancius hanedanlığınca onaylanmış ve Lex Dragonus ile resmiyete kavuşturulmuş katı bir yetki ayrımı vardır. Aşarın Leethus'a ve Leethus'tan taşınması ile güvenliğinin sağlanması, Adeptus Arbites'in vazifesidir. Hanedanlığın başı dışında yalnızca bizim Leethus'a ayak basmaya ve koordinatlarını bilmeye hakkımız vardır. Yasanın hükmü budur."
